name: SetPowerBIDatasetParameters
author: Ali Mostafa
instanceNameFormat: Set Power BI dataset parameters: Cluster $(CLUSTER), Database: $(DB)

inputs.name: Password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password of the user. Value should be a secured variable.

inputs.name: ClientId
inputs.label: ClientId
inputs.helpMarkDown: ClientId of the application that has access to the PowerBI API.

inputs.name: TenantId
inputs.label: TenantId
inputs.helpMarkDown: TenantId for the tenant where the dataset resides.

inputs.name: GroupId
inputs.label: PBI Group Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Id of the group where the dataset resides.

inputs.name: ParamsArray
inputs.label: Parameters Array
inputs.helpMarkDown: the parameters array to be set - should be provided in json format.

inputs.name: Refresh
inputs.label: Refresh dataset
inputs.helpMarkDown: Should the dataset be refreshed after setting parameters?
